title: Linux chage Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the chage command in Linux, learn how to modify user password expiration dates, and enforce password expiration policies for enhanced system security.

meta.title: Linux chage Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the chage command in Linux, learn how to modify user password expiration dates, and enforce password expiration policies for enhanced system security.
meta.keywords: Linux, chage command, password expiration, password policy, system management, system security

verify.name: Verify user password expiration date
verify.hint: The password expiration date for the labex user should be set to Feb 01, 2023.

verify.name: Verify user password expiration date
verify.hint: The password expiration date for the labex user should be set to Apr 01, 2023.

verify.name: Verify password expiration policy
verify.hint:
The password expiration policy for the labex user should be:
- Minimum password age: 7 days
- Maximum password age: 90 days
- Password expiration warning: 7 days
